mapper.select: SELECT BRIDGE_TRAN_RSPK, BRIDGE_TRAN_BS, BRIDGE_TRAN_ACNO, BRIDGE_TRAN_RONO, BRIDGE_TRAN_RTYPE, DATE_FORMAT(BRIDGE_TRAN_IDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %p %H:%i') AS BRIDGE_TRAN_IDATE, DATE_FORMAT(BRIDGE_TRAN_ODATE, '%Y-%m-%d %p %H:%i') AS BRIDGE_TRAN_ODATE, CASE WHEN NOW() BETWEEN BRIDGE_TRAN_IDATE AND BRIDGE_TRAN_ODATE THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS CHECKIN, BRIDGE_TRAN_GNAME, BRIDGE_TRAN_URL, BRIDGE_TRAN_KEY, BRIDGE_TRAN_KIDA, IFNULL(BRIDGE_TRAN_KCDA, '') AS BRIDGE_TRAN_KCDA, BRIDGE_TRAN_BKYB, BRIDGE_TRAN_KUDA, BS_NAME, BS_LOGO, BS_TEL, BS_CODE FROM fo_bridge_tran LEFT JOIN co_bs_code BS ON BS.BS_CODE = BRIDGE_TRAN_BS WHERE BRIDGE_TRAN_BS = #{hotelCode} AND BRIDGE_TRAN_RSPK = #{rspk} AND BRIDGE_TRAN_ACNO = #{acno} AND BRIDGE_TRAN_RONO = #{rono}
